metadata.title: Workout Tracker
metadata.description: Workout Tracker is your ultimate fitness companion. Log workouts, monitor progress, and achieve your fitness goals with ease.

errors.title: Something went wrong
errors.message: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.

codes.INVALID_INPUT: Invalid input. Please check your data and try again.
codes.SIGNUP_FAILED: Failed to sign up. Please check your information and try again.
codes.SIGNUP_FAILED_GENERIC: Failed to sign up. Please try again later.
codes.SIGNIN_FAILED: Failed to sign in. Please check your credentials and try again.
codes.SIGNIN_FAILED_GENERIC: Failed to sign in. Please try again later.
codes.NOT_AUTHENTICATED: You must be signed in to perform this action.
codes.ACCESS_DENIED: You do not have permission to perform this action.
codes.WORKOUT_NOT_FOUND: The requested workout was not found.
codes.FAILED_TO_CREATE_WORKOUT: Failed to create workout. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_UPDATE_WORKOUT_TITLE: Failed to update workout title. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_COMPLETE_WORKOUT: Failed to complete workout. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_ADD_EXERCISES_TO_WORKOUT: Failed to add exercises to workout. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_REMOVE_EXERCISE_FROM_WORKOUT: Failed to remove exercise from workout. Please try again later.
codes.EXERCISE_NOT_FOUND: The requested exercise was not found.
codes.FAILED_TO_CREATE_EXERCISE: Failed to create exercise. Please try again later.
codes.SET_NOT_FOUND: The requested exercise set was not found.
codes.FAILED_TO_CREATE_EXERCISE_SET: Failed to create exercise set. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_UPDATE_EXERCISE_SET: Failed to update exercise set. Please try again later.
codes.FAILED_TO_DELETE_EXERCISE_SET: Failed to delete exercise set. Please try again later.

SignIn.title: Login
SignIn.subtitle: You must log in to access the exercises and your workouts.

Contact.title: Get in Touch
Contact.description: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions, feedback, or need assistance, feel free to reach out.

ContactForm.title: Send a Message
ContactForm.successMessage: Thank you for reaching out! We'll get back to you soon.
ContactForm.errorMessage: Oops! Something went wrong. Please try again later.

HeroSection.title: Track Your Workouts with WT.
HeroSection.description: Simplify your fitness journey with our intuitive workout tracking tools.

FeaturesSection.subHeading: Everything you need to train smarter, stay consistent, and see real results.
FeaturesSection.feature1Desc: Track your workouts efficiently with our user-friendly interface designed for fitness enthusiasts.
FeaturesSection.feature2Desc: List of exercises with detailed descriptions and images to guide your workouts.
FeaturesSection.feature3Desc: Monitor your fitness journey with PR tracking and performance analytics.

ExerciseList.errorMessage: We couldn't load the exercises. Please try again later.
ExerciseList.noExercisesMessage: Try adjusting your filters to find what you're looking for.

ExercisePage.error: Something went wrong while loading the exercise. Please try again.

ActiveWorkoutCard.title: Active Workout
ActiveWorkoutCard.noActiveWorkout: Start a new workout to see it here.

WorkoutHistory.title: Workout History
WorkoutHistory.noWorkoutsMessage: You haven't logged any workouts yet. Start tracking your workouts to see them here.

workoutSheet.title: Add Exercises
workoutSheet.subtitle: Add exercises to your workout by selecting them from the list below.

workoutLoading.title: Loading workout...
workoutLoading.error: Something went wrong while loading the workout. Please try again.
